title: De Couleur Pale: A City In The Sky
description: Creed Skye had a pretty normal life...until she turned seven. Of course, a city in the sky could hardly be called normal, but it was all she had ever known. Then her journal fell down below, a place unknown to Creed and the other citizens. Six years later, on an incredible journey to find the journal, Creed is caught up in a web of excitement and adventure.
author: Brooke Harrison
